Streamlined Printing with the e-FOLLOW Cloud Extension for Chromebook and Chrome Browsers

The e-FOLLOW Cloud Extension for Chromebook and Chrome browsers offers a seamless solution for users seeking a hassle-free printing experience while ensuring robust security measures. This extension simplifies the process of connecting to the e-FOLLOW Cloud, providing users with immediate access to their virtual printers.

Advantages:
•   User-Friendly Interface: The e-FOLLOW Cloud Extension boasts a user-friendly interface that is easy to navigate, even for users with minimal technical expertise. The intuitive design ensures that you can quickly access your virtual printers without any confusion.

•   Automated Connection: Say goodbye to tedious manual configurations. This extension automates the connection process to your e-FOLLOW Cloud profile, eliminating the need for complex setup procedures. Simply install the extension, and it will seamlessly integrate with your existing e-FOLLOW account.

•   Effortless Printer Detection: Once connected, the extension effortlessly detects and displays all virtual printers associated with your e-FOLLOW profile. No more time wasted searching for printers or struggling with compatibility issues.

•   One-Click Printing: Printing a document is as simple as clicking on the desired virtual printer within the extension's interface. The streamlined process ensures that you can print your documents with minimal clicks and no unnecessary steps.

•   Access Control: Maintain control over who can print to your virtual printers. The extension allows you to set access permissions, ensuring that only authorized users can send documents to your virtual printers.

•   Secure Cloud: e-FOLLOW Cloud is known for its commitment to security. The extension leverages this secure cloud environment to protect your documents, preventing unauthorized access and data breaches.

The e-FOLLOW Cloud Extension for Chromebook and Chrome browsers redefines the printing experience by offering a perfect blend of simplicity and security. With its user-friendly interface, automated setup, and robust security measures, this extension ensures that your printing tasks are effortless and your sensitive documents are kept safe. Say goodbye to printing hassles and embrace a new era of streamlined and secure document management with the e-FOLLOW Cloud Extension.

In order for the extension to work, it is REQUIRED to have a e-FOLLOW running in the Cloud or Locally with appropriate license.
